headline: Multimodal Understanding & Generation
summary: I study joint modeling of vision, language, and speech with an emphasis on robust alignment, parameter-efficient adaptation, and few-shot generalization for large multimodal models.

focus.title: Vision-Language Alignment
focus.description: Combine contrastive learning and instruction tuning to better ground semantics in complex scenes.

focus.title: Efficient Inference
focus.description: Prototype layered attention and caching tricks to lower latency during long-form dialogue generation.

focus.title: Evaluation Suites
focus.description: Design benchmarks covering QA, captioning, and retrieval to study reliability in real-world settings.
